## Exploratory Data Viz

Check out your data a bit:

```{r}
#| include: false

# Tell me the column names
names(penguins)

# What are the dimensions
dim(penguins)

# Can you show me the first 6 lines?
head(penguins)

# Can you show me the last 6 lines?
tail(penguins)
```
